(bed flattening)
(cmd line: -i bed_flattening.txt -t)
(szerszám beállítás)

t1 m d2 h19

xyz
t1
s50
f900

safetop0.00
safebottom0.00
overcut0.000

pre_mill_steps2

#max meredekség polikarbonát 0.05/100mm
emax1

fmax900
fmin700
fratio0.8

z1 = 0.05
c1 = 0.05


d0 = 6
d = mul($d0,0.7)
d2 = mul($d,2)

w = 380
h = 220
x = 0
y = 0

offset3,3,0

b outline $x,$y size$w,$h z$z1 c$c1 m1

x = add($x,$d)
y = add($y,$d)
w = sub($w,$d2)
h = sub($h,$d2)
b outline $x,$y size$w,$h z$z1 c$c1 m1

#2
x = add($x,$d)
y = add($y,$d)
w = sub($w,$d2)
h = sub($h,$d2)
b outline $x,$y size$w,$h z$z1 c$c1 m1

#3
x = add($x,$d)
y = add($y,$d)
w = sub($w,$d2)
h = sub($h,$d2)
b outline $x,$y size$w,$h z$z1 c$c1 m1

#4
x = add($x,$d)
y = add($y,$d)
w = sub($w,$d2)
h = sub($h,$d2)
b outline $x,$y size$w,$h z$z1 c$c1 m1

#27
x = add($x,$d)
y = add($y,$d)
w = sub($w,$d2)
h = sub($h,$d2)

print $x
print $y
print $w
print $h

x2 = add($x, $w)
l $x,$y $x2,$y z$z1 c$c1 m1
